Components

These are some reusable components that can be used in campus web projects.

Buttons

Button color options include:

  • Blue
  • Gold
  • Black
  • Dark Gray
  • Light Gray
  • White

Examples

Normal Buttons

Button

Type: Normal Blue
Class: button button-blue

Button

Type: Normal Gold
Class: button button-gold

Button

Type: Normal Black
Class: button button-black

Button

Type: Normal Dark Gray
Class: button button-gray-dark

Button

Type: Normal Light Gray
Class: button button-gray-light

Button

Type: Normal White
Class: button button-white

Small Buttons

Button

Type: Small Blue
Class: button button-small button-blue

Button

Type: Small Gold
Class: button button-small button-gold

Button

Type: Small Black
Class: button button-small button-black

Button

Type: Small Dark Gray
Class: button button-small button-gray-dark

Button

Type: Small Light Gray
Class: button button-small button-gray-light

Button

Type: Small White
Class: button button-small button-white

Large Buttons

Button

Type: Large Blue
Class: button button-large button-blue

Button

Type: Large Gold
Class: button button-large button-gold

Button

Type: Large Black
Class: button button-large button-black

Button

Type: Large Dark Gray
Class: button button-large button-gray-dark

Button

Type: Large Light Gray
Class: button button-large button-gray-light

Button

Type: Large White
Class: button button-large button-white

Full Width Buttons

Button

Type: Full Blue
Class: button button-full button-blue

Button

Type: Full Gold
Class: button button-full button-gold

Button

Type: Full Black
Class: button button-full button-black

Button

Type: Full Dark Gray
Class: button button-full button-gray-dark

Button

Type: Full Light Gray
Class: button button-full button-gray-light

Button

Type: Full White
Class: button button-full button-white

HTML

  
    <a href="#" class="button button-blue">Button</a>
    <a href="#" class="button button-gold button-small">Button</a>
    <a href="#" class="button button-black button-full">Button</a>

Ghost Buttons

Ghost buttons are buttons with a semi-transparent background and need to be placed on an appropriate background for theme to be viewable and accessible.

Button

Type: Ghost Blue
Class: button-ghost button-full button-ghost-blue

Button

Type: Ghost Gold
Class: button-ghost button-full button-ghost-gold

Button

Type: Ghost Black
Class: button-ghost button-full button-ghost-black

Button

Type: Ghost Dark Gray
Class: button-ghost button-full button-ghost-gray-dark

Button

Type: Ghost Light Gray
Class: button-ghost button-full button-ghost-gray-light

Button

Type: Ghost White
Class: button-ghost button-full button-ghost-white

HTML
  
    <a href="#" class="button-ghost button-ghost-blue">Button</a>
    <a href="#" class="button-ghost button-ghost-gold button-small">Button</a>
    <a href="#" class="button-ghost button-ghost-black button-full">Button</a>

    • Nested List Item 2

Style: None

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-none">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Style: Underline

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-underline">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Style: Border

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-border">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Icon Lists

The following list styles require the Font Awesome icon library.

Style: Check Icon

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-none">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Style: Check Icon

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-check">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Style: Checkbox Icon

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-checkbox">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Style: Angle Double Icon

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-angle-double">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Style: Circle Arrow Icon

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-circle-arrow">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Style: Star Icon

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-star">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Style: Pointing Finger Icon

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-finger">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Linear Lists

Display list items in a horizontal list

  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  • List Item 1
  • List Item 2
  • List Item 3
  
    <ul class="list-style-linear">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

    <ul class="list-style-linear-dots">
      <li>List Item 1</li>
      <li>List Item 2</li>
      <li>List Item 3</li>
    </ul>

Tables

Name Favorite Color
Bob Yellow
Michelle Purple

Zebra Striping

Name Favorite Color
Bob Yellow
Michelle Purple 
  
    <table class="table-zebra">
      <tr>
        <th>Name</th>
        <th>Favorite Color</th>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Bob</td>
        <td>Yellow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Michelle</td>
        <td>Purple</td>
      </tr>
    </table>

Condensed

Name Favorite Color
Bob Yellow
Michelle Purple 
  
    <table class="table-condensed">
      <tr>
        <th>Name</th>
        <th>Favorite Color</th>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Bob</td>
        <td>Yellow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Michelle</td>
        <td>Purple</td>
      </tr>
    </table>

Small

Name Favorite Color
Bob Yellow
Michelle Purple 
  
    <table class="table-small">
      <tr>
        <th>Name</th>
        <th>Favorite Color</th>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Bob</td>
        <td>Yellow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Michelle</td>
        <td>Purple</td>
      </tr>
    </table>

Rows

Name Favorite Color
Bob Yellow
Michelle Purple 
  
    <table class="table-horizontal">
      <tr>
        <th>Name</th>
        <th>Favorite Color</th>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Bob</td>
        <td>Yellow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Michelle</td>
        <td>Purple</td>
      </tr>
    </table>

Columns

Name Favorite Color
Bob Yellow
Michelle Purple 
  
    <table class="table-vertical">
      <tr>
        <th>Name</th>
        <th>Favorite Color</th>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Bob</td>
        <td>Yellow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Michelle</td>
        <td>Purple</td>
      </tr>
    </table>

No Borders

Name Favorite Color
Bob Yellow
Michelle Purple

Usage

  
    <table class="table-noborder">
      <tr>
        <th>Name</th>
        <th>Favorite Color</th>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Bob</td>
        <td>Yellow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td>Michelle</td>
        <td>Purple</td>
      </tr>
    </table>
